title: Waterproof feathers
description: Ducks have waterproof feathers, which have a waxy coating that repels water.

title: Social Queens *quack*
description: Ducks are super social animals. When on water, they often form groups called 'paddlings' which protects them from predators.

title: Regional Accents
description: Ducks have regional accents! Ducks from London have a rougher quack because they live in a noisy city, while ducks in the country make more relaxed quacks.

title: Mating
description: Female ducks pick their mate based on how well they dance
